title: write a json-ld  suammary
body:
ref: http://json-ld.org/

Data is messy and disconnected. JSON-LD organizes and connects it, creating a better Web.

title: make a dummy passport authentication for testing
body: let kuansim support dummy authentication instead of using facebook or github or  twitter to login , so developer could use a curl tool to test endpoints.

title: pgrest cookbook shall check the existence of kuansim database
body: Current pgrest cookbook does not check the existence of kuansim database, so it will cause 'database already exists' error if the database is created before.

title: Setup coverage report for unit test
body: Use <https://coveralls.io/> to setup coverage report for unit test.

title: 鄉民關心你－新手入門網站規劃
body: 引導想參加鄉民關心你的鄉民，了解專案在做什麼，新手必做的事情，了解專案的工具，以及如何實際參與專案。希望藉由這個網站，讓鄉民不會有迷路的感覺，而且可以無痛進入狀況，找到可以做的事。

title: 蒐集中央政府或地方政府機關報案系統的位置
body:
Summary:

政府有設立很多線上的報案單一窗口, 需要整理一下清單, 等之後做任務追蹤系統時會用到

例如:

台北市市長信箱: https://contact.taipei.gov.tw/CCLM/CLM/ASPX/CLM00100Q.aspx

請放到待孵化點子區
http://hack.g0v.tw/kuansim/bw2FTvecSSm

<!---
@huboard:{"order":47.0}
-->

title: 書籤 Inbox 整理頁面
google chrome extension
body:
Should do:
- send the url of the new article  that a user is reading to newspac.
- if the newspac had parsed that article, then stored that resolved id. so a user could retrieved the data from newpac when he is checking inbox later.

UI mockup:
- https://moqups.com/hychen/mwaA7Gt1/p:acc0e0011

Restful API:
- http://hack.g0v.tw/kuansim/z0XwS5cmyg9

howto:

- 產品規劃文件的空白模板可以在hack.g0v.tw/kuansim上找到
